DOC.detailed_description: - 1,000 participant enrol OPEN CTO study . - Study coordinator screen men woman age 18 admitted elective CTO-PCI procedure . - Study coordinator train Coordinating Center Saint Luke 's Hospital Kansas City . - Participants screen Eligibility , Informed Consent obtain . - Participants also ask sign Medical Records Release form , Billing Records Release form . - Detailed procedural data obtain Study Coordinator local Principal Investigator . - Participants undergo Baseline interview . - These data enter electronic data capture system , Velos , stringent protection quality control . - Participants telephone follow-up interview conduct centralized Follow-up Center Saint Luke 's Hospital .
